overview:
Samir is an serial entrepreneur, currently working as CoFounder at mSauda. mSauda is the first eCommerce platform enabling consumer-to-consumer collaboration.

Samir has more than 16 years of diverse and global technology experience.

Earlier, Samir was founder & CEO of MobiPrimo, a technology product company that won Red Herring Asia award as Top 100 company in 2011. MobiPrimo was acquired by PubMatic Inc in early 2012.

Prior to MobiPrimo, Samir worked at Persistent Systems, managing operations for the Telecom Business unit with more than 1,000 people working across globe. Then, he incubated Mobile & Wireless Business unit, and this business unit grew to the multi-million dollar business.

Prior to Persistent Systems, Samir helped Comverse in defining award winning mobile messaging platform, deployed with multiple tier-1 carriers across the world.

Prior to Comverse, Samir helped Lernout & Hauspie, a world leader in speech products, in defining and launching next-generation natural language processing (NLP) product suite.

Samir holds Bachelors degree in Electronics & Telecommunications Engineering from India and Masters Degree in Computer Science from Boston University.
